statusList.Name: Burn
statusList.Description: Burns the enemy, applying damage over time for 3 turns.

statusList.Name: Freeze
statusList.Description: Freezes the enemy, reducing their speed for 2 turns.

statusList.Name: Stun
statusList.Description: Stuns the enemy, making them unable to move for 1 turn.

statusList.Name: Poison
statusList.Description: Poisons the enemy, slowly draining their health over 4 turns.

statusList.Name: Invisible
statusList.Description: Makes the player invisible, avoiding enemy attacks for 2 turns.

statusList.Name: Knockdown
statusList.Description: Knocks down the enemy, preventing them from attacking for 1 turn.

statusList.Name: Blind
statusList.Description: Blinds the enemy, decreasing their attack accuracy for 2 turns.

statusList.Name: Silence
statusList.Description: Silences the enemy, preventing them from using mana for 3 turns.

statusList.Name: Curse
statusList.Description: Curses the enemy, reducing their strength by 15% for 3 turns.

statusList.Name: Fear
statusList.Description: Induces fear in the enemy, potentially causing them to flee or not attack for 2 turns.

statusList.Name: Slow
statusList.Description: Reduces the target's speed by 30% for 2 turns.

statusList.Name: Shock
statusList.Description: Shocks the enemy, dealing 5 damage each turn for 3 turns.

statusList.Name: ManaBurn
statusList.Description: Burns 50% of the target's current mana.

statusList.Name: Toxin
statusList.Description: Poisons the enemy, causing 3 damage over 4 turns.

statusList.Name: Drench
statusList.Description: Drenches the target, reducing their resistance by 20% for 3 turns.

statusList.Name: Stagger
statusList.Description: Causes the target to stagger, reducing their accuracy by 10 for 2 turns.

statusList.Name: Crush
statusList.Description: Crushes the target's defenses, reducing it by 25% for 2 turns.

statusList.Name: Scorch
statusList.Description: Scorches the target, burning 10% of their current health each turn for 3 turns.
